column1:
Castaway Day 1
I've made it to an unknown island.
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 2
I'll trap something to eat.
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 3
Nothing but nature here...
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 4
About to collapse from hunger...
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 5
Finally, something to eat!
You got 1 Cat Ticket!

Castaway Day 6
Time to prepare a meal!
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 7
Everything's tasty on an empty belly.
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 8
Even muddy water tastes good.
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 9
A "HELP" message in a bottle?!
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 10
Something's caught in my trap!
You got 1 Cat Ticket!

Castaway Day 11
I'll explore the whole island!
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 12
Other castaways on the island!
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 13
I wrote a song just by humming.
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 14
Those clouds... a storm's brewing!
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 15
Storm washed up some good stuff!
You got 1 Rare Ticket!

Castaway Day 16
Stewing scraps left by the storm...
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 17
I've started a beautiful fire!
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 18
I've gotten used to the dark.
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 19
The morning sun looks so lovely.
You got 1 Legend Trap!

Castaway Day 20
The seagulls dropped something!
You got 1 Cat Ticket!

Castaway Day 21
I could live on an island forever.
You got 1 Legend Trap!
